existing_features.title: Remove the QR-code-based Custom Credit Cards feature from the main navigation by deleting the "Cards" tab and its screen from the app UI.
Revert the Checkout dialog so it no longer offers a QR-based credit card payment method and no longer uses the in-app QR scanner flow.
Remove unused QR/custom-card frontend modules and dependencies from the build after the UI is reverted (components, hooks, and imports related to custom QR credit cards and scanning).

new_feature_requests.summary: Revert to the normal design and remove the QR-code-based UI/flow

projectName: Revert POS UI to remove QR-code-based custom credit cards and scanner flow
